name: USDT
description: USDT on Solana is a Solana-native stablecoin implemented as an SPL token, designed to maintain a 1:1 peg with the US dollar via parity with USDC. It leverages Solana’s high-performance, low-cost infrastructure to enable fast settlements, efficient trading, payments, remittances, and DeFi integrations across the Solana ecosystem.
